text: Harald Scharff (20 February 1836-3rd January 1912) was a Danish ballet dancer and actor. The roles he became famous for was James in La Sylphide in 1856, and as Paolo in Flower Festival in Genzano, in 1858. Scharff might have had a relationship with Hans Christian Andersen. title: Harald Scharff
